messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

phone system issues after upgrade sent operations phone upgrade saturday rd hi we noticed after recent upgrade customers phone calls redirect properly outside sd hours calls redirected operational instead ooh sd we noticed if someone called until morning call diverted our phones rang could you please correct thank you best regards monitoring engineer en ops ops sent phone upgrade saturday rd analyst sent friday phone upgrade saturday rd hi guys should things go awry tomorrow during phone upgrade please contact for awareness have provided him with draft notification case needs send out users incident manager dec en sent friday re phone upgrade saturday rd hi yes please if can contact would be great regards head wrote hi understand your concerns with notifying entire about confusion cause likelihood phone outage tomorrow minimal users generally aware alternative contact methods for sd such self notification was prepared for other clients safety plan case other safety measures fail due unforeseen circumstances we have contingency place expect any issues however unlikely event outage would you like contact you for awareness thanks kind regards incident manager dec en sent friday re phone upgrade saturday rd hi difficult one we really want send whole tm only cause confusion tested confident we have issues with call forwarding regards head wrote hi thanks for getting back yes we have phone calls be diverted another number notification was unlikely case something went wrong with forwarder well users were unable reach by phone thanks kind regards incident manager dec en sent friday re phone upgrade saturday rd hi if you have you suspect any outages then would leave tm if someone calls would be diverted another number regards head wrote hi finds you well looking for your advice matter client for tm we having upgrade tomorrow own phone starting there be any downtime we have place forwarders mobile phones have also set up however have bases covered have prepared draft notification letting anyone wishes contact know phones down providing them with alternative contact number mobile phone we usually send out tm can you please let know if you think notification should be sent out any key contacts thanks kind regards incident manager dec en one largest multimedia publishers with award winning portfolio brands important notice including any message.reasoning:
**Categorizing an IT ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket based on a user's long text about a phone system upgrade, including issues like outages and call forwarding. The possible categories are: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, and Administrative rights. I'm considering "Internal Project" because it involves an upgrade and planning, but "Hardware" could apply due to phone considerations. Ultimately, "Internal Project" feels like a better fit for this ticket.**Formatting the category object**

I need to produce a JSON-like category object based on the user's IT ticket regarding their phone system upgrade. The instruction specifies a valid format: {"category":"..."}, with possible categories including Hardware, HR Support, Access, and others. Since the ticket focuses on upgrading the phone system and related communications, "Internal Project" is the best fit. It could technically align with "Hardware," but the focus is mainly on the upgrade process. So my final output will be: {"category":"Internal Project"}.
